content:
1. Sabhaye! Vishvasthe! Neeyezhunnettu villanguka nin-
Maahaathmyam samgathamaa-yenneshaayaa chonnaan
Bhoopanmaarum vanpadayum-kooppeedum nin paadapeedham
/thaaleluyyaa -nirddhanaye varddhippippon
/tdhanyan thaanennavaraarkkum.

2. Paavanamaam pallllee! Madbahaayil ninnil vaazhum
Suthane sthothram cheythaalum-rakthashareerangall
Thannu pulartthi mahaunnathyam-chertthavane sthothram chey/200ka
/thaaleluyyaa-nin manavaalloththhaanatthil
/tninma-kkallkkathyaanandam.
